name: Starfall
description: You target an area within a moderate (20 unit) distance and call down a shard of a star that explodes, dealing 14 aetheric damage to any creatures within a 2 unit radius from that point who fail a defense check of 10. The radius is increased to 3 units when this spell is channeled under visible stars.
charge: You call down two additional shards, that cannot overlap with each other or the original shard.
